entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -12.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm along parts of the coast. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
